room_title: Escape room "Sweet Shoppe" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: A great time had by all. We survived! So many things that might be clues (one hint: the chairs are from ikea but that doesn't have anything to do with it).

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Shoppe" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: Had a lot of fun with friends! Would recommend to any group looking to try something new. As a suggestion, they should at least tell you where to start so you don't end up skipping steps. Could get confusing.

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Shoppe" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: Awesome place, great people, was not easy, worth the price...best part is that both u n the staff have the same level of excitement when u get out of the room. Waiting for the next theme.

room_title: Escape room "Sweet Shoppe" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
review: So much fun! Definitely a must do! Challenging and teamwork is a must!
